description_for_human:
This plugin retrieves parts of a web page's or pdf's content for you,
but only web pages that have static html content, so web sites like medium, wiki etc... should work...
Also it only returns first ~1300 chars from the page.
EXAMPLE USAGE: "Please summarize this web page for me: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lorem_ipsuma"
description_for_model: This is a plugin that retrieves web page and pdf content for you
